meanings.sent1: I need to reship this package because it got lost in the mail.
meanings.sent2: After realizing the mistake, she decided to reship the order to the correct address.
meanings.sent3: The forgetful pirate had to reship the treasure chest after leaving it behind.
meanings.sent4: She had to reship her dreams of a perfect vacation when the first booking fell through.
meanings.sent5: The company promised to reship the damaged goods free of charge.

meanings.sent1: Please reship the document as soon as possible.
meanings.sent2: The online store agreed to reship the missing items without any extra cost.
meanings.sent3: The magician had to reship the rabbit after it disappeared during the trick.
meanings.sent4: She had to reship her love letter after the first one got lost in the mail.
meanings.sent5: The astronaut had to reship the satellite due to a technical error.

meanings.sent1: The reship of the package was necessary to correct the mistake.
meanings.sent2: The company offers a reship service for damaged goods.
meanings.sent3: The reship of the order was delayed due to bad weather conditions.
meanings.sent4: The reship of the product was done efficiently to meet the deadline.
meanings.sent5: The reship of the package arrived just in time for the event.
